MetaData.ApsimToSim:
[foreach Soil.SoilWater]
[Model SoilWater] [soil.SoilWater.DiffusConst] [soil.SoilWater.DiffusSlope] [soil.SoilWater.CN2Bare] [soil.SoilWater.CNRed] [soil.SoilWater.CNCov] [soil.SoilWater.Salb] [soil.SoilWater.SummerCona] [soil.SoilWater.WinterCona] [soil.SoilWater.SummerU] [soil.SoilWater.WinterU] [soil.SoilWater.SummerDate] [soil.SoilWater.WinterDate]
[soil.Water.Thickness] [soil.Water.SAT] [soil.Water.DUL] [soil.Water.LL15] [soil.Water.AirDry] [soil.SoilWater.SWCON] [soil.Water.BD] [soil.Water.SW]
[if [soil.SoilWater.MWCON]][soil.SoilWater.MWCON][endif] [if [soil.Water.KS]][soil.Water.KS][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.Slope]][soil.SoilWater.Slope][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.DischargeWidth]][soil.SoilWater.DischargeWidth][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.CatchmentArea]][soil.SoilWater.CatchmentArea][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.KLAT]][soil.SoilWater.KLAT][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.MaxPond]][soil.SoilWater.MaxPond][endif]
[endfor] [foreach Soil.Swim]
[Model Swim3] [Swim.Cn2Bare] [Swim.CnRed] [Swim.CnCov] [Swim.Salb] [soil.Water.Thickness] [soil.Water.AirDry] [soil.Water.SAT] [soil.Water.DUL] [soil.Water.LL15] [soil.Water.BD] [soil.Water.SW] [soil.Water.KS] [soil.Swim.Kdul] [soil.Swim.PsiDUL] [soil.Swim.VC] apsim calc [soil.Swim.dtmin] [soil.Swim.dtmax] [soil.Swim.MaxWaterIncrement] [soil.Swim.SpaceWeightingFactor] [soil.Swim.SoluteSpaceWeightingFactor] [soil.Swim.diagnostics] [if [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainDepth]] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainDepth] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainSpacing] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainRadius] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.Klat] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.ImpermDepth] [endif] [if [soil.Swim.SwimWaterTable.WaterTableDepth]] [soil.Swim.SwimWaterTable.WaterTableDepth] [endif]
[soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.a] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthc] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthp] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dis] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.disp] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNO3] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNH4] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableUrea] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableCl] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NO3Exco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NO3FIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NH4Exco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NH4FIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.UreaExco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.UreaFIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.ClExco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.ClFIP]
[endfor]
[Model SoilNitrogen]
[soil.SoilOrganicMatter.RootCN] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.RootWt] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.SoilCN] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.EnrACoeff] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.EnrBCoeff] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.OC] [soil.Analysis.PH] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.FBIOM] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.FINERT] [soil.Nitrogen.NO3] [soil.Nitrogen.NH4]
0.0324 0.0150
0.0 1.0 1.5 2.0 3.0
0.05 0.05 1.00 1.00 0.05
500.0 0.76 0.76 0.76 0.593 0.46 0.46 0.46
0.0274 0.0137
0.0001 0.00005
0.00 0.00
0.0010848 0.0005424
0.0000323 0.00001615
default stable
0.59 0.2
0.41 0.8
0.0 0.0
off
0.05 0.025
0.0005 0.00025
0.0081 0.004
0.2 0.3 0.54 0.57 0.45 0.05
0.7 0.3 0.37 0.37 0.47 0.05
[foreach Soil.Phosphorus]
[Model SoilP] [soil.Phosphorus.RootCP] [soil.Phosphorus.RateDissolRock] [soil.Phosphorus.RateLossAvail] [soil.Phosphorus.SorptionCoeff] [soil.Phosphorus.LabileP] [soil.Phosphorus.BandedP] [soil.Phosphorus.RockP] [soil.Phosphorus.Sorption]
[endfor] [if [soil.Analysis.CL]]
1000 0 cl 0 [soil.Analysis.CL]
[endif]

Model.name: SoilWater

canopy_eos_coef.description: coef. in exp effect of canopy on

sw_top_crit.description: critical sw ratio in top layer

solute_flow_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flow (0-1)

solute_flux_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flux (0-1)

gravity_gradient.description: soil water gradient due to gravitational

Model.mobile_solutes: no3 urea cl br org_n org_c_pool1 org_c_pool2 org_c_pool3

canopy_fact_default.description: canopy factor to use if height is missing

chisel.description: will have no effect - SOILWAT the same as old ver.

SoilNParameterSet.description: the parameter set used to initialise SoilNitrogen

allowSimpleSoilTemp.description: whether internal soilTemp can be used, otherwise the SoilTemp has to be present

allowProfileReduction.description: whether soil profile reduction is allowed or not

allowOrganicSolutes.description: whether organic solute are defined or not

defaultCarbonInSoilOM.description: factor to convert organic carbon to organic matter

defaultInitialpH.description: Default initial ph, used case no pH is initialised in model

WarningNegativeThreshold.description: Threshold for raising a warning due to small negative values

FatalNegativeThreshold.description: Threshold for a fatal error due to negative values (loss of mass balance)

UseCodenitrification.description: flag whether routines for nitrification and codenitrification are to be used (ignore old nitrification)

MininumRelativeAreaCNPatch.description: Minimum allowable relative area for a CNpatch (0-1)

NPartitionApproach.description: Approach to use when partitioning dltN amongst patches

LayerNPartition.description: Layer thickness to consider if N partition between patches is BasedOnSoilConcentration (mm)

AllowPatchAutoAmalgamation.description: Whether auto amalgamation of CN patches is allowed (yes/no)

AutoAmalgamationApproach.description: Approach to use for AutoAmalagamation (CompareAll, CompareBase, CompareMerge)

basePatchApproach.description: Approach to use for defining the base patch (IDBased, AreaBased)

AllowPatchAmalgamationByAge.description: Should an age check be used to force amalgamation of patches? (yes/no)

PatchAgeForForcedMerge.description: Age after which patches will be merged if AllowPatchAmalgamationByAge = yes (years)

relativeDiff_TotalOrgC.description: Relative difference in total organic carbon (0-1)

relativeDiff_TotalOrgN.description: Relative difference in total organic nitrogen (0-1)

relativeDiff_TotalBiomC.description: Relative difference in total organic nitrogen (0-1)

relativeDiff_TotalUrea.description: Relative difference in total urea N amount (0-1)

relativeDiff_TotalNH4.description: Relative difference in total NH4 N amount (0-1)

relativeDiff_TotalNO3.description: Relative difference in total NO3 N amount (0-1)

relativeDiff_LayerBiomC.description: Relative difference in urea N amount at any layer (0-1)

relativeDiff_LayerUrea.description: Relative difference in urea N amount at any layer (0-1)

relativeDiff_LayerNH4.description: Relative difference in NH4 N amount at any layer (0-1)

relativeDiff_LayerNO3.description: Relative difference in NO3 N amount at any layer (0-1)

absoluteDiff_TotalOrgC.description: Absolute difference in total organic carbon (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_TotalOrgN.description: Absolute difference in total organic nitrogen (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_TotalBiomC.description: Absolute difference in total organic nitrogen (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_TotalUrea.description: Absolute difference in total urea N amount (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_TotalNH4.description: Absolute difference in total NH4 N amount (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_TotalNO3.description: Absolute difference in total NO3 N amount (kg/ha)

absoluteDiff_LayerBiomC.description: Absolute difference in urea N amount at any layer (ppm)

absoluteDiff_LayerUrea.description: Absolute difference in urea N amount at any layer (ppm)

absoluteDiff_LayerNH4.description: Absolute difference in NH4 N amount at any layer (ppm)

absoluteDiff_LayerNO3.description: Absolute difference in NO3 N amount at any layer (ppm)

DepthToTestByLayer.description: Depth to consider for tests by layer, if -ve soil depth is used (mm)

DiffAdjustFactor.description: Factor to adjust the tests between patches other than base (0-1)

MaximumNitrogenAvailableToPlants.description: The maximum amount of N that is made available to plants in one day (kg/ha)

MaximumUptakeRateNH4.description: Maximum NH4 uptake rate for plants (ppm/day)

MaximumUptakeRateNO3.description: Maximum NO3 uptake rate for plants (ppm/day)

MBiomassTurnOverRate.description: potential daily rate of soil biomass mineralization (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

MBiomassRespirationFactor.description: fraction of biomass C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

MBiomassFractionIntoBiomass.description: fraction of retained biomass C returned to biomass (0-1)

AHumusTurnOverRate.description: potential daily rate of humus mineralization (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

AHumusRespirationFactor.description: fraction of humic C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

InitialFOMType.description: The FOM type to be used for initialisation

InitialFOMAmount.description: Total amount of FOM in the soil (kg/ha)

InitialFOMDepth.description: Depth down to which initial FOM will be ditributed (mm)

FOMDistributionCoefficient.description: Exponent of function used to compute initial distribution of FOM in the soil

InitialCNrFOM.description: Depth down to which initial FOM will be ditributed (mm)

FOMCarbTurnOverRate.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool1 (0-1)

FOMCellTurnOverRate.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool2 (0-1)

FOMLignTurnOverRate.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool3 (0-1)

FOMRespirationFactor.description: fraction of FOM C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

FOMFractionIntoBiomass.description: fraction of retained FOM C transferred to biomass (0-1)

ResiduesRespirationFactor.description: fraction of residue C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ResiduesFractionIntoBiomass.description: fraction of retained residue C transferred to biomass (0-1)

ImmobilisationDepth.description: depth of soil from which N can be immobilised by decomposing surface residues (mm)

cnrf_ReductionCoeff.description: coeff. to determine the magnitude of C:N effects on decomposition of FOM

cnrf_CNthreshold.description: C:N above which decomposition rate of FOM declines

stf_DecompFOM_Topt.description: parameters for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

stf_DecompFOM_FctrZero.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_DecompFOM_CvExp.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

swf_DecompFOM_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swf_DecompFOM_y.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

stf_MinerSOM_Topt.description: parameters for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

stf_MinerSOM_FctrZero.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_MinerSOM_CvExp.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic conditions)

swf_MinerSOM_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swf_MinerSOM_y.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

potHydrol_min.description: minimum potential hydrolysis rate for urea (/day)

potHydrol_parmA.description: parameter A for potential urea hydrolysis function

potHydrol_parmB.description: parameter B for potential urea hydrolysis function

potHydrol_parmC.description: parameter C for potential urea hydrolysis function

potHydrol_parmD.description: parameter D for potential urea hydrolysis function

stf_Hydrol_Topt.description: parameters for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_Hydrol_FctrZero.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_Hydrol_CvExp.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

swf_Hydrol_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swf_Hydrol_y.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

nh4_at_half_pot.description: NH4 concentration at half potential nitrification (Michaelis-Menten kinetics)

n2oLossFactor.description: Fraction of nitrification lost as denitrification

stf_Nitrif_Topt.description: parameters for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_Nitrif_FctrZero.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_Nitrif_CvExp.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

swf_Nitrif_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swf_Nitrif_y.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

phf_Nitrif_phx.description: parameters for pH factor, values of soil ph (0-14)

phf_Nitrif_y.description: parameters for pH factor, values of pH factor corresponding to x (0-1)

NitritationPotential.description: Maximum soil potential nitritation rate (ug NH4/g soil/day)

NH4AtHalfNitritationPot.description: NH4 concentration when nitritation is half of potential (Michaelis-Menten kinetics)

NitratationPotential.description: Maximum soil potential nitratation rate (ug NO2/g soil/day)

NO2AtHalfNitratationPot.description: NO2 concentration when nitratation is half of potential (Michaelis-Menten kinetics)

AmmoxLossParam1.description: Parameter to determine the base fraction of ammonia oxidated lost as N2O

AmmoxLossParam2.description: Parameter to determine the changes in fraction of ammonia oxidated lost as N2O

TOptmimunNitrififaction.description: parameters for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

FactorZeroNitrification.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

ExponentNitrification.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

Nitrification_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

Nitrification_swy.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

Nitritation_phx.description: parameters for pH factor affecting nitritation, values of soil ph (0-14)

Nitritation_phy.description: parameters for pH factor affecting nitritation, values of pH factor corresponding to x (0-1)

Nitratation_phx.description: parameters for pH factor affecting nitratation, values of soil ph (0-14)

Nitratation_phy.description: parameters for pH factor affecting nitratation, values of pH factor corresponding to x (0-1)

Nitratation_NIFx.description: parameters for nitratation inhibition factor due to NH3+NO2, values of N concentration (ppm)

Nitratation_NIFy.description: parameters for nitratation inhibition factor due to NH3+NO2, values of inhibition factor corresponding to x (0-1)

CodenitRateCoefficient.description: codenitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

TOptmimunCodenitrififaction.description: parameter for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

FactorZeroCodenitrification.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

ExponentCodenitrification.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

Codenitrification_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

Codenitrification_swy.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

Codenitrification_phx.description: parameters for pH factor affecting codenitrification, values of soil ph (0-14)

Codenitrification_phy.description: parameters for pH factor affecting codenitrification, values of pH factor corresponding to x (0-1)

Codenitrification_NHNOx.description: parameters for NH3NO2 factor affecting the fraction of N2 during codenitrification, values of soil N (ppm)

Codenitrification_NHNOy.description: parameters for NH3NO2 factor affecting the fraction of N2 during codenitrification, values of N fraction corresponding to x (0-1)

DenitRateCoefficient.description: denitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

actC_parmA.description: parameter A to compute active carbon

actC_parmB.description: parameter B to compute active carbon

allowNewPools.description: whether new selection of C pools is used (yes/no)

allowExpFunction.description: whether the exponential function is to be used (yes/no)

actCExp_parmA.description: parameter A of exponential function to compute active carbon

actCExp_parmB.description: parameter B of exponential function to compute active carbon

stf_dnit_Topt.description: parameter for the temperature factor, optimum temperature (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_dnit_FctrZero.description: parameters for the temperature factor, value of factor at zero degrees (aerobic and anaerobic)

stf_dnit_CvExp.description: parameters for the temperature factor, curve exponent (aerobic and anaerobic)

swf_dnit_swx.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of modified swc (0-3)

swf_dnit_y.description: parameters for the moisture factor, values of moisture factor corresponding to x (0-1)

dnit_k1.description: K1 parameter from Thorburn et al (2010) for N2O model

N2N2O_parmA.description: parameter A in the equation computing the N2:N2O ratio

N2N2O_parmB.description: parameter B in the equation computing the N2:N2O ratio

swpsf_dnit_swpx.description: parameters for WFPS factor to compute N2:N2O ratio, values of water filled pore space (%)

swpsf_dnit_y.description: parameters for WFPS factor to compute N2:N2O ratio, values of WFPS factor corresponding to x (0-1)

enr_a_coeff.description: coefficient A for erosion enrichment function

enr_b_coeff.description: coefficient B for erosion enrichment function

Model.name: SoilP

rate_decr_placement.description: 0.5 () ! (, 1) Fractional loss of placement effect per yr

act_energy_loss_avail_P.description: Effect of soil temperature on P availability

availP_ratio.description: Ratio of available P : unavailable P at steady state

eff_band.description: 3.0 () ! Relative effectiveness of banded_p compared with broadcast_p

Model.crop_name: maize wheat navybean cowpea pigeonpea soybean peanut mungbean weed sorghum butterflypea centro lablab millet millet1 millet2 millet3 millet4 millet5

variable.name: cn2_bare
variable.description: curve number input used to calculate runoff

variable.name: cn2_new
variable.description: CN2 after modification for crop cover

variable.name: cn_cov
variable.description: cover term in curve number equation

variable.name: cn_red
variable.description: CN reduction in curve number equation (cover)

variable.name: cover_surface_runoff
variable.description: Effective cover used in runoff calculation

variable.name: eos
variable.description: Potential evap after modification for green cover and residue

variable.name: esw
variable.description: Extractible soil water relative to LL15

variable.name: flow
variable.description: depth of water moving from layer l+1 into layer l because of unsaturated flow. positive value indicates upward movement into layer l, negative value indicates downward movement (mm) out of layer l

variable.name: flux
variable.description: initially, water moving downward into layer l, then water moving downward out of layer l

variable.name: outflow_lat
variable.description: lateral flow out of the profile

variable.name: profile_esw_depth
variable.description: initial depth of extractable soil water distributed from the top down

variable.name: profile_fesw
variable.description: initial fraction of esw of profile distributed from top down

variable.name: wet_soil_depth
variable.description: initial depth of soil filled to drained upper limit (field capacity)

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool1
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 1

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool2
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 2

variable.name: dlt_fom_c_pool3
variable.description: delta fom C pool in fraction 3

variable.name: dlt_fom_n_min
variable.description: Net FOM N mineralized, negative for immobilization

variable.name: dlt_res_c_atm
variable.description: Carbon from residues lost to atmosphere

variable.name: dlt_res_c_biom
variable.description: Carbon from residues lost to atmosphere

variable.name: dlt_res_c_hum
variable.description: Carbon from residues converted to humic

variable.name: excess_nh4
variable.description: Excess N required above NH4 supply

variable.name: soilp_dlt_org_p
variable.description: variable needed by soilp in its calculations

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_atm
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to atmosphere

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_biom
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to biomass

variable.name: soilp_dlt_res_c_hum
variable.description: Carbon from all residues to humic
